channel.title: How Do I IP Ban
channel.description:
i need IP ban code, can someone give the code, and were to put it, and in which file?
Thanks

item.title: How Do I IP Ban
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“ipban”)
&& (playerRights >= 3)) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
int index = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(victim);
client v = (client) server.playerHandler.players[index];

        appendToBannedIps(v.connectedFrom);
        v.disconnected = true;
        sendMessage("player successfully ip banned");
        PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName
                + ": HAS IP BANNED THE PLAYER: " + command.substring(5);
        BufferedWriter bw = null;

        try {
            bw = new BufferedWriter(
                    new FileWriter("logs/ipbanlogs.txt", true));
            bw.write(playerName + " banned" + victim);
            bw.newLine();
            bw.flush();
        } catch (IOException ioe) {
            ioe.printStackTrace();
        } finally {
            if (bw != null) {
                try {
                    bw.close();
                } catch (IOException ioe2) {
                    sendMessage("Error logging ip bans!");
                }
            }
        }
    }

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: How Do I IP Ban
item.dc:creator: @dyde08 dyde08
item.description:
@dyde08 wrote:

there should be a folder named “ipban” or something
along those lines and it should be inside a folder named
“more info” or something along those lines.

all you have to do is go into your character files and
click on the person you want to ip ban. look at the
last ip they logged in from,copy and paste it into
the “ipban” folder.

thats all you have to do :] thats the long way though.
if you want to figure out a shortcut such as a command
you’ll need to go to “tutorials”.

`dyde

Read full topic
